item.description:
If the first letter of your last name begins with the following letter bring the food item:
A-F Entrée – your favorite comfort meal instead
G-P 1 bottle of wine or a six pack of beer
Q-T tossed green salad / vegetable tray with dip (make sure to include dressing)
U-V 2 bottles soda and 2 gallons of water
W 1 lb ground coffee and Italian bread and butter
XYZ Dessert

Please NO CHIPS or crackers

***Of course if you are unable to bring anything, then your entry fee will be $20.00.

Organizer/Host - Richard Tosti

Format:
Location is in a warm, loving and relaxing environment.
"Dress code - Your choice if you want to wear a costume.
7:00 - 11:00pm
Saturday, October 18, 2008
Temple Shalom Emeth, 16 Lexington Street, Burlington,MA
Maximum attendees 140
Dancing will be available - DJ

Buffet which will start at 8:00 (we keep the food warm and bring it out together)
Dessert served at 9:30 with coffee
Open Bar - wine/beer/soft drinks/water that you are assigned to bring

_____________

You can sign up on http://dance.meetup.c...

You do not need to email me personally.
140 guests only

Location and Directions
Temple Shalom Emeth, 16 Lexington Street, Burlington,MA

128 North
Exit 32B Middlesex Turnpike (Burlington/Arlington)
At the end of the ramp turn right onto Middlesex Turnpike - on the left is Barnes/Noble
After the Burlington Mall turn right on to Burlington Mall Rd. - on left is Longs Jewelers
Take left after you pass Kohl’s on your left which is Lexington Street, Burlington, Ma

There are two parking lots on the right side of building. Enter through the side entrance at the end of the building. Third parking lot is two houses up at Church - we have permission. Fourth parking lot is across the street - McGinnis Ave., - Mt Hope Church.

You know the time, the location and what you should bring so let’s have fun!
See you on Saturday, October 18th at 7:00pm

The best is yet to be!
Richard Tosti
item.name: Halloween Singles Dance Party 40-65
